name: Torque Masonry Gallery for Divi
author: Divi Torque

sections.description:
Torque Masonry Gallery Plugin for Divi and Extra Theme

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Most helpful links

  • Divi Torque Plugin
  • Divi Torque Changelog
  • Knowledge Base

Elevate your website’s visual appeal with the Torque Masonry Gallery Plugin. Specifically designed for Divi enthusiasts, this cascading grid-style gallery offers a captivating alternative to the standard Divi Masonry Gallery.

Check the Demos

Masonry Gallery
This unique gallery style maintains a consistent image width while allowing for varying heights, ensuring your photos stand out in a sea of uniformity.

Features Include:

  • Easy Configuration: Streamlined settings make it a breeze to integrate and manage the gallery.
  • Create Image Galleries: Build stunning visual narratives with ease.
  • Custom Columns & Responsive Galleries: Adjust and tailor the number of columns to suit your design needs and ensure your gallery looks impeccable on any device.
  • Divi Compatibility: Seamlessly integrates with both Divi and Divi Visual Builder, ensuring a smooth user experience.
  • Customizable Display Options: Choose to show or hide image titles and captions, and further tweak the caption color and font size to align with your brand’s aesthetics.

Upgrade your website’s visual game with the Torque Masonry Gallery Plugin. Ideal for Divi users looking for an innovative and beautiful way to showcase their images.

SUPPORT THAT CARES! ‚õëÔ∏è

We know you want a good product with strong support. We’re here to answer your questions and help you use our plugin effectively.

Need help? We are just a click away!

sections.installation:
Note: This plugin works with Divi. Make sure you have Divi Theme installed.

Install the Torque Masonry Gallery either via the WordPress plugin directory or by uploading the files to your server at wp-content/plugins.

For more information, please visit our Knowledge Base.

short_description: Create a stunning masonry gallery display using multiple animation effects.
